title: Perceptual constancy in the dark - application

content.description: Maria wakes up in the middle of the night to get a drink of water. As she enters the kitchen, she sees a bowl of red strawberries that appear brown in the dim light, but she still perceives them to be red.
content.question: Which of the following psychological phenomena best explains her experience?

skill.text: 1.A: Apply psychological perspectives, theories, concepts, and research findings to a scenario.
